Class EventDashboard.EventDashboardUpdater

  • java.lang.Object

  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    RecordProcessor<CompositeRecord>

    class EventDashboard.EventDashboardUpdater
extends CompositeRecordProcessor
    Updates the fields as events are processed.
